DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Europe. The aim of this study is investigate the potential of a supplementary insulin therapy regimen (SIT) as intensification for insufficiently controlled patients with type 2 diabetes in a normal diabetes care setting.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of Insulin Aspart and, if Necessary, Insulin Levemir (FlexPenÂ®) in the Evening or at Bedtime
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes OAD monotherapy OAD combination therapy Therapy with OAD and basal insulin Conventional insulin therapy with premixed insulin
